local p
function startup(lul_device) luup.log("Arduino plugin: loading library L_Arduino ...") if (package.path:find ("/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua", 1, true) == nil) then package.path = package.path .. ";/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua" end
package.loaded.L_Arduino = nil p = require("L_Arduino") if (package.loaded.L_Arduino == nil) then luup.log("Arduino plugin: plugin is not installed correctly. Library L_Arduino cannot be loaded.", 1) luup.task("Plugin not correctly installed", 2, "Arduino plugin", -1) return false end
luup.log("Arduino plugin: library L_Arduino loaded")
return p.startup(lul_device) end
